task_intent.title: Body Composition Tracking with BMR/TDEE
task_intent.description: Complete body composition logging system including height, weight, body fat percentage, muscle mass, with automatic BMR (Mifflin-St Jeor) and TDEE calculations. Visualize changes over time with Swift Charts graphs showing trends and goal progress.
